Subjects: Christ, prayers to; Christ, presence in the Eucharist; Eucharist, Christ’s presence in
_description: A prayer to Christ in the eucharist — four couplets

BNfr1830.Transcription:
Jesu welcome mote þow beIn forme of bred os I þe
                    seJesu for þin holy nameKepe me fro synne & schame As
                    þou art of a maydyn bornLate me neuere be for lornN[e] late me
                    neuere for myn synneLese þe ioyȝe þat þou art
                    inne
BNfr1830.Editions:
Barratt,  Alexandra. 
             “A Middle English Lyric in an Old French Manuscript.” 
             Medium Ævum
         5 (1983): 226-9: 228.
